content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. Let's negotiate the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I appreciate the opportunity to discuss the rental price of your apartment. Could you please provide an initial offer for the unfurnished one-bedroom unit in the city center?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm looking for at least €1500 per month. That's my starting point for the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I understand your starting point. I would like to propose €1400 per month, considering the unfurnished state of the apartment. Would this be an acceptable price for you?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but €1400 is too low for me. I'm looking for at least €1500 per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Could you perhaps consider €1450 per month, given the proximity to amenities and the new construction of the apartment?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: That's still too low for me, Yi-Nuo Wang. I'm looking for at least €1500 per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I understand your position. However, I would like to remind you that the apartment is currently unfurnished, which might be a consideration for the rental price. Would you be willing to meet in the middle at €1475 per month?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I'm not willing to meet in the middle. I'm looking for at least €1500 per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mister Schmidt. If you're not willing to meet in the middle, then I'm afraid we have reached an impasse. TERMINATE
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
